name: The Business of Open Source | How Useful Tools Create Brand Identity and Community with Loris Degioanni
summary: Loris Degioanni is the CEO and Founder of Sysdig, an open-source company working to make cloud deployment more secure through the use of runtime insights. Loris and I sit down to discuss the bet Sysdig is making to position itself as a leader in cloud security, how Loris leverages the power of a...
